content: pattakkaaran:- (oru praarththana. Avasaanatthil) svarggasthanaaya njangalute pithaave!

Janam: - ninte thirunaamam parishuddhamaakkappetaname. Ninte raajyam varaname. Ninte thiruvishtam svarggatthileppole bhoomiyilum aakaname. Njangalkku aavashyamulla appam innu njangalkku tharaname. Njangalute katakkaarotu njangal kshamicchathupole njangalute katangalum paapangalum njangalotu kshamikkaname. Pareekshayilekku njangale praveshippikkaruthe. Pinneyo dushtanilninnu njangale rakshicchukollaname. Enthukondennaal raajyavum shakthiyum mahatthuvavum ennekkum ninakkullathaakunnu. Aammeen.
Shushrooshakkaaran: - baarekmor. Anaykkappetta ee vishuddharahasyangal kykkollunnathinu mumpu veendum karunayullakartthaavin്re mumpaake naam thala kunikkanam.
Janam: njangalute kartthaavum dyvavume, nin്re thirumumpaake njangal thala kunikkunnu.
pattakkaaran: - (pattakkaaran patinjaarottu thirinju rooshma cheythukondu) parishuddhavum mahatthuvamullathum…
Shushrooshakkaaran: - baarekmor. Bhayatthotum virayalotum naam sookshikkanam.
Janam :- kartthaave, karuna thonni njangalute mel anugraham cheyyaname.
pattakkaaran:- (peelaasaa uyartthikkondu) ee vishuddhathakal vishuddhiyullavarkkum vetippullavarkkum nalkappetunnu.
Janam: - parishuddhanaaya ekapithaavum parishuddhanaaya eka puthranum parishuddhanaaya ekaroohaayumallaathe parishuddhan illa. Aammeen.
Janam: - onnaayirikkunna pithaavinum puthranum jeevanulla vishuddha roohaaykkum ennekkum sthuthi. Aammeen.
Pattakkaaran: - karunayote lokatthe srushticcha pari shuddhanaaya ekapithaavu nammotukoote.
Pattakkaaran: - than്re vilayeriya kashtaanubhavangalaal lokatthe rakshiccha parishuddhanaaya ekaputhran nammotukoote.

Pattakkaaran: - undaayittullathum undaakuvaanullathumaaya pakalattheyum, poornnamaakkunna jeevanulla eka parishuddharoohaayum nammotukoote. Kartthaavinte thirunaamam aadi muthal ennannekkum vaazhtthappettathaayirikkatte.

dyvatthinte makkalaayittheeruvaan jeevicchirunnappol namme padtippicchavaraaya nammute maathaapithaakkanmaare kurbbaanakalilum namaskaarangalilum naam orkkanam. Azhivillaattha lokamaaya svarggaraajyatthil neethimaanmaarotum punyavaanmaarotumkoote dyvaputhran avare aashvasippikkum. Kartthaave! Krupa cheythu sahaayikkaname.

dyvasuthanmaaraayituvaan aayushkkaale padtippiccha
thaathanmaare orkkenam praarththana kurbbaanakalil naam;
shaashvatharaajye svarggatthil neethijnjanmaar siddhanmaar
enni-varoppam dyvasuthan aashvaa-samavarkkekeetum.
Janam :- pithaavum puthranum parishuddha roohaayumaayavan vandikkappettavanum sthuthikkappettavanum aakunnu. Aadimuthal thalamura thalamurakal vareyum thanikku sthuthi haalelu-yyaa.

Janam :- aa-mmeen. Njangalute kartthaave! Njangalotu karuna cheyyaname. Njangalute kartthaave! Krupayundaayi njangalotu karuna cheyyaname. Njangalute kartthaave! Uttharamaruliccheythu njangalotu karuna cheyyaname. Njangalute kartthaave! Ninakku sthuthi. Njangalute kartthaave! Ninakku sthuthi. Ennekkum njangalute sharanavume, ninakku sthuthi. Haale-lu-yyaa.
/tunnathangalil dyvatthinu sthuthiyum-thante maathaavinu bahumaanavum - sahadenmaarkku pukazhchakalute kireetavum - maricchupoyavarkku karunayum anugrahangalum undaayirikkatte - haale-lu-yyaa.

naathaa! Krupa cheytheetaname,
naathaa krupa cheyyanamalivaal
krupa cheyyanamuttharamaruli
krupa cheyyaname ninakku sthuthi-haaleluyyaa.

Sthuthi dyvatthinnuyaratthil
thanmaathaavinnunnathiyum
mahimaamuti sahadenmaarkkum
mrutharil karunayumundaaka-haaleluyyaa.

1. Undaa-katte-nallormma
naathaa ninnute-jananiyaam
kanyaka mariyaa-minnennum
thal praarththana thunayaakatte-haaleluyyaa.

2. Undaa-katte-nallormma.
Nibi shleehanmaar-sahadenmaar-
kkellaa punyamezhunnorkkum
thal praarththana thunayaakatte-haaleluyyaa.

3. Undaa-katte-nallormma
moraan baselosinnum
aaboon (innaarkkum)
thal praarththana thunayaakatte-haaleluyyaa.
pattakkaaran:- njangalute kartthaavum, ennekkum njangalute dyvavume!...

janam:- bhoolokam ninne muttukutthi vandikkum. Sakala naavukalum nin്re thirunaamatthinu sthothram cheyyum. Enthennaal nee maricchavare uyirppikkunnavanum kabaratakkappettavarute nalla sharanavumaakunnu. Haalelu-yyaa.

bhoovaake namikkum ninne
ellaa naavum sthuthi paatum
kabaratanjaar nal sharanam neeye
mruthar thannuyirppum nee thanne. Haale-lu-yyaa.
